ABC(16)=101010111100(2)=2748(10)
2331(10)=100100011011(2)=91B(16)
001001111010101101110110(2)=27AB76(16)=2599798(10)

2331/2=1165r1
1165/2=582r1
582/2=291r0
291/2=145r1
145/2=72r1
72/2=36r0
36/2=18r0
18/2=9r0
9/2=4r1
4/2=2r0
2/2=1r0
1/2=0r1

0000=0
0001=1
0010=2
0011=3
0100=4
0101=5
0110=6
0111=7
1000=8
1001=9
1010=A=10
1011=B=11
1100=C=12
1101=D=13
1110=E=14
1111=F=15

C=12*16^0=12
B=11*16^1=176
A=10*16^2=2560
A+B+C=12+176+2560=2748

27AB76=2599798
6=6*16^0=6
7=7*16^1=112
B=11*16^2=2816
A=10*16^3=40960
7=7*16^4=458752
2=2*16^5=2097152
